memberdef.name: SECURESHIELD_AC_SIZE_ROUND_UP
memberdef.initializer: 0x10000000UL /* the resource size should be rounded up */

memberdef.name: SECURESHIELD_AC_SIZE_ROUND_DOWN
memberdef.initializer: 0x20000000UL /* the resource size should be rounded down */

memberdef.name: SECURESHIELD_AC_SHARED
memberdef.initializer: 0x40000000UL /* the resource is a shared resource (no implementation now) */

memberdef.name: SECURESHIELD_AC_SECURE
memberdef.initializer: 0x80000000UL /* the resource is a secure resource */

memberdef.name: SECURESHIELD_AC_NORMAL
memberdef.initializer: 0x0UL /* the resource is a normal resource */

memberdef.name: SECURESHIELD_CONTAINER_MAGIC
memberdef.initializer: 0x42CFB66FUL /* magic number to identify container configuration */
